Posts.Content: Mar 27, 2009 01:58PM Sandygirl wrote: Had TC x4 last treatment 1-23.  I also had the eye twitching from treatment 1 until a few weeks after the last one.  I never had the metallic taste in my mouth but I could not taste salt.  I continued to cook for my family and after few ruined meals, figured out that my taste buds were not the same.  They are back to normal now.  I was so happy that my eyebrows and eyelashes never fell out when everything else did.  But two months after chemo I am losing them when everything else is growing back.  Figure that one out.
Posts.Title: What's your wierdest side effect ann-idiot ann-idiot

Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2009 09:16AM Sandygirl wrote: Hi, Just wanted to let you know you are in the right place to find support.  There are alot of  women that have been in your shoes.  I would have to say that the worst thing for me was the waiting.  Like you, I had to wait a weekend for the surgeon to call me with the results.  It is the unknown that is difficult to deal with.  You are not silly to worry about this, we all get a little crazy when we have to wait. The procedure will not be as bad as you have made it out in your mind. (At least that is how everything that I have done in the past nine months has worked out.)  Let me know how things go for you tomorrow.  I will keep you in my prayers.
